text:
I checked this out and will watch the video today. $4k is obviously a massive spend for this kind of thing, especially for a freelancer like me who is just getting going — what would you say offered you the most value?

Would love to hear more about your experience actually taking the 10-week launchpad :slightly_smiling_face:

elements.text:
I checked this out and will watch the video today. $4k is obviously a massive spend for this kind of thing, especially for a freelancer like me who is just getting going — what would you say offered you the most value?

Would love to hear more about your experience actually taking the 10-week launchpad

text:
I hear you on the price of it! I ended up signing up just before I left my corporate job to start freelancing, and spent so much time weighing the cost vs. the potential value.

Personally, it was worth it and I'm considering doing the upcoming cohort as well. Over the course of those 10 weeks, I actually made the membership cost back in new work opportunities from other members, which I wasn't expecting! And I'm collaborating with another member on a new project I'm super excited about. 

A couple other things that made it worth it to me:

1. The workshops covered everything from personal branding to defining your ideal client profile to streamlining your back office (and a bunch of other things I didn't know I needed). Since I was new to the freelance world, I tried to do all of them, but you can also pick and choose the ones that are the best fit. And you get the workshop recordings to keep forever. 

2. The community aspect was amazing. Everyone I met was excited to brainstorm, pressure test ideas, and help wherever they could. It's a super active community of people from all fields and stages of their careers, so I was always hearing advice and perspectives I never would have considered on my own.

Basically, I went from a bit of a skeptic to wishing this was standard education for all freelancers :slightly_smiling_face:.

Price-wise, I just checked in with Sam since they were doing a friends and family thing at the end of 2021. He said he doesn't mind extending it to members here. That deal was $3k for membership to both the Fall and Spring 2022 cohorts. If you're on the fence, also happy to intro you to <https://www.linkedin.com/in/sam-lee-b15b892/|Sam> directly so he can help assess if it might be a fit. Even if it isn't a fit, I can attest to the fact that he's a fun person to know!

text: hey superpath freelancers! If anyone is free today at 1 pm PT, kaleigh moore and i are hosting a free Q&A to celebrate the launch of S4 of our podcast. we’re fielding questions from writers and it would be nice to have a few seasoned people in the crowd. we both specialize in saas and related fields. we’re hoping to turn the q&a into a podcast episode. would love if you joined. <https://lu.ma/tts6h75x>

text:
Hi everyone, inBeat Agency is hiring a Ecommerce Newsletter Editor.:fire::fire::fire:

If you love studying brands and figuring out what makes them as good as they are, this role is definitely for you.

To this day, we’ve built an email list of about 30,000 digital marketers, mostly in the e-commerce space. We have done nothing with this list, and we’re looking for someone to help us unlock that potential. That’s where you come in.

We’re looking for someone to deep dive into the e-commerce rabbit hole to create an actionable newsletter for DTC / e-commerce people.

Your job is to identify insights from your research and package them into actionable bites for our readers.

Learn more and apply here
<https://dynamitejobs.com/company/InbeatAgency/remote-job/ecommerce-newsletter-editor?utm_source=slack&source=slack>

Thank you !

attachments.fallback: Dynamite Jobs: Remote Job - Dynamite Jobs
attachments.text: Easily Access Talent from All Over the World.
attachments.title: Remote Job - Dynamite Jobs

text: Looking for a copywriter who is skilled at sales copy, emails and blog posts. Ideally you have experience working with a service-based business or Instagram. This would be an ongoing monthly position! Please DM me with your experience and rates.
